pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
CJ4 PFD or MFD Overlay Bezel See here for contact info and notes: http://simstrumentation.com
There is a userprop to set overlay as PFD or MFD. This is only used for display dimming by Light Panel or Virtural Cockpit Light Panel.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
